overview:
Im a digital marketing consultant, part of a strategy consultancy.

So what do we do? Companies ask us to consider their web activity, devise new strategies to achieve specific goals (no always sales!). We look at the whole gamut of web. From the platform, usability, optimisation, content, communication routes and the fundamental eCommerce methodologies being used. We are combining both a marketing and technical approach. For many companies we become the senior web team they couldn’t afford to have on the payroll, but nevertheless are desperate for senior thinking to drive them forward.

I was involved in my first commercial website in 1998, and haven’t stopped since. Whilst alot of my web commercial work (actually running web depts/businesses in plc’s) has been in travel the last 3 years have seen me branch into Financial services, fashion, motor hire, promotion sites and more.
